traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the illithilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed illithilich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The illithilich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6 damage) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 21 (3d10 + 5 damage) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the lich. 55 (10d10 damage) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the lich kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The illithilich magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 (5d8 + 5 damage) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Tentacles
entries: The illithilich makes one attack with its tentacles.

legendary.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The illithilich recharges its Mind Blast and uses it.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 1â€“3 Actions)
entries: The illithilich uses a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, or 3rd-level spell that it has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The illithilich's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components.
